category.name: Classification
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ICS_classify_immediately
preference.preference_description: Determines the default setting of the Classify Immediately option in the New Item, Save As, and Revise dialog boxes. This preference is valid only when the ICS_classify_new preference is set. Valid Values: 0 - The Classify Immediately option is not selected by default when the dialog box appears. 1 - The Classify Immediately option is selected by default when the dialog box appears.
